subject: Hockey, Ice
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Brain
lead_paragraph: Gary Bettman, the N.H.L. commissioner, has said there is not enough data on the causes of brain trauma to justify stiffer penalties for fighting, but some doctors say ample evidence exists.
snippet: Gary Bettman, the N.H.L. commissioner, has said there is not enough data on the causes of brain trauma to justify stiffer penalties for fighting, but some doctors say ample evidence exists.
